entry.title: Blogix 1.0 is released!
entry.content:
Blogix is a web framework designed by Ivan Shubin for building static blogs and websites.
It comes out of box with following features:

  • Java classes compilation
  • Textile extended markup for posts and documents
  • Syntax highlight for code samples
  • Responsive design
  • Freemarker-based templates processing
  • Tiles templates configuration
  • Simple text file-based database
  • RSS-feed (global and category-based)
  • Archive page
  • Built-in webserver
